# authenticationPolicy

**Type Property**

A property that defines the authentication policy that indicates whether this app intent requires the device to be unlocked or otherwise authenticated.

## Declaration

```swift
static var authenticationPolicy: IntentAuthenticationPolicy { get }
```

## Specifying the authentication policy

- **IntentAuthenticationPolicy**: An enumeration that describes the authentication policy to use when running an app intent.

items.description: An enumeration that describes the authentication policy to use when running an app intent.
items.name: IntentAuthenticationPolicy
